history.proof: intros L' P H_equal H_atomic H_imp H_not H_forall. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. qsimpl use: Formula_depth_rec2. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros L P H_equal H_atomic H_imp H_not H_forall.

ctx: intros L' P H_equal H_atomic H_imp H_not H_forall.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language L' : Formula -> Prop P : forall t t0 : Term, L' (equal t t0) H_equal : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), L' (atomic r t) H_atomic : forall f : Formula, L' f -> forall f0 : Formula, L' f0 -> L' (impH f f0) H_imp : forall f : Formula, L' f -> L' (notH f) H_not : forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> L' b) -> L' (forallH v a) H_forall : Formula f : Formula The term "f" has type "Formula" while it is expected to have type "Term".

ctx: intros L' P H_equal H_atomic H_imp H_not H_forall.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language X : forall P : Formula -> Set, (forall t t0 : Term, P (equal t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic r t)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> forall f0 : Formula, P f0 -> P (impH f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula, P f -> P (notH f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH v a)) -> forall a : Formula, P a L' : Formula -> Prop P : forall t t0 : Term, L' (equal t t0) H_equal : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms (arity L (inl r))), L' (atomic r t) H_atomic : forall f : Formula, L' f -> forall f0 : Formula, L' f0 -> L' (impH f f0) H_imp : forall f : Formula, L' f -> L' (notH f) H_not : forall (v : nat) (a : Formula), (forall b : Formula, lt_depth b (forallH v a) -> L' b) -> L' (forallH v a) H_forall : Formula Unable to unify "L' (atomic ?M1735 ?M1736)" with "L' H_forall".

original: intros L P H_equal H_atomic H_imp H_not H_forall. apply (Formula_depth_rec2 (fun f => P f)). - apply H_equal. - apply H_atomic. - apply H_imp. - apply H_not. - apply H_forall.
